trans-unit.source: Specifies how to synchronize a directory within a domain.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a cookie.
A Byte data type object that specifies the directory synchronization search cookie.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization object.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> data type object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization option.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> data type object that specifies how a directory synchronization search is performed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object with a directory synchronization option and cookie.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> data type object that specifies how a directory synchronization search is performed.
A Byte data type object that specifies the directory synchronization search cookie.
Returns a copy of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> instance.
Returns a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object.
Gets the directory synchronization search cookie.
The returned search results must be enumerated before the cookie can be retrieved.
For more information, see the code example [Taking a Snapshot for a Later DirSync Search](http://msdn.microsoft.com/msdnmag/issues/05/12/DirectoryServices/default.aspx?loc=&fig=true).
The directory synchronization search cookie object.
Gets or sets the options for the directory synchronization search.
The options that can be used with this property are found in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions> enumeration.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> object.
The value is not one of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronizationOptions"></xref> values.
Resetss the directory synchronization search cookie.
Resets the directory synchronization search cookie.
A Byte data type object that contains a directory synchronization search cookie.
This method resets the cookie for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySynchronization"></xref> object instance to this value.
